name: Planetary Ranger
description:
It is the year 4053. Sentient monsters named Logorbs have invaded the planet and the years of war have left the planet in disarray and chaos. You play a "ranger", a protector of the planet, traveling around, fighting back against the monsters, and saving as many of the remaining humans as you can. However, one mission,  a lot of weird things start happening...the ground starts to shake...tears in reality start appearing...and your weapons start passing through Logorbs that are not real...

Controls

WASD to move

LEFT CLICK to attack

SPACE to dash

RIGHT CLICK to throw pinchers picked up by killing Logorbs

Unfortunately, controller support has not yet been implemented, though I hope to do that in the future.

Credits

Playtester and creator of "Red" art: Modboy

Everything else was created from scratch by me.
